items.title: home
items.content_html: github action that creates a post on x.com.

items.title: setting up x api credentials
items.content_html: to use the x post action, you'll need to set up a developer account and create an app on x.

items.title: description
items.content_html: this action allows you to automatically post messages to x from your github workflow.

items.title: example usage
items.content_html: below are examples of how to use the x post action in your github workflows.

items.title: features
items.content_html:
✨ features

key features

  • automated posting: publish updates to x directly from your github workflows
  • community integration: post to specifi...

items.title: how it works
items.content_html: the x post action uses the twitter api v2 (via the twitter-api-v2 npm package) to post messages to x.

items.title: contributing
items.content_html: contributions are welcome! this page explains how you can help improve the x post action.

items.title: getting started
items.content_html: this project uses node.js and the twitter api v2 client.

items.title: testing
items.content_html: this project uses jest for testing with both unit tests and integration tests.
